about_content: Taskfy is a task management application.
prompt_task_name: What name do you want to give to the task?
login_message: Please log in to your account
about_title: Taskfy: Modern and Customizable Task Manager
about_p1: Taskfy is an intuitive and efficient task manager designed to improve personal and professional organization. Developed to help you keep track of your daily activities, Taskfy enables the creation, organization, and prioritization of tasks in a practical and effective way.
about_p2: Our platform provides a user-friendly environment with advanced features that simplify task management, such as setting deadlines, categories, and priorities for your activities. Additionally, Taskfy offers integration with other productivity services like calendars and cloud storage, delivering a complete and optimized user experience.
about_p3.4: Collaborate as a team on projects and tasks
about_p4: Taskfy is designed to meet the needs of both individual users and teams, offering a flexible solution for managing tasks and projects.
